short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Streaming Days turns your New Tab page into Music Streaming & Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Streaming Days is a high-end functional tool that provides an exceptional custom search experience powered by Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install “Your Streaming Days” Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Get a chance to enjoy instant access to the wide variety of online music channels, radio stations and other additional websites. Unique approach of this tool guarantees exceptional music experience to all the customers. Simple and fast in use – available in the menu item of the extension with quick links to the best music services.
You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.

Visit our website at https://yourstreamingdays.com/
Read more about us: https://yourstreamingdays.com/about-tab/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://yourstreamingdays.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms & Conditions: https://yourstreamingdays.com/term-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://yourstreamingdays.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/
